com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.util

类 ByteBufferBackedOutputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.OutputStream
      • com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.util.ByteBufferBackedOutputStream
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Closeable, Flushable, AutoCloseable

    public class ByteBufferBackedOutputStream
extends OutputStream
    Simple OutputStream implementation that appends content written in given ByteBuffer instance.
